div.p: A CodeSystem to identify the reason a list may be incomplete.
Copyright Statement: Copyright Â© 2016 HL7 UK
This code system https://fhir.hl7.org.uk/STU3/CodeSystem/CareConnect-ListWarningCode-1 defines the following codes:

tr.td: Items excluded due to confidentiality and/or patient preferences.
Patient record transfer from previous GP practice not yet complete; any information recorded before dd-mmm-yyyy has been excluded.
Patient data may be incomplete as there is data supplied by a third party awaiting review before becoming available.

description.value: A CodeSystem to identify the reason a list may be incomplete.

definition.value: Items excluded due to confidentiality and/or patient preferences.
Patient record transfer from previous GP practice not yet complete; any information recorded before dd-mmm-yyyy has been excluded.
Patient data may be incomplete as there is data supplied by a third party awaiting review before becoming available.
